Spatial plotting just improved a lot in the development version of ggplot2. In a nutshell, you can now mix and match regular geoms with `geom_sf()` and `coord_sf()`. If you're doing any geospatial plotting, please test this out. 1/n
#rstats #ggplot2 https://t.co/GBcjb6MUh1

Why teach people in your company #rstats? So many reasons! R is:
- Free
- Reproducible
- Data manipulation is easier thanks to tidyverse
- Lots of online resources
+ more
- @astroeringrand https://t.co/CLbqGLCkLD

It’s easy to re-analyze *most* meta-analyses because the data you need is typically reported in forest plots.
